channel.title: Posts on Richard Knox
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Richard Knox

item.title: Keep It Simple
item.description: Why we should be mindful of complexity in A/B test design

item.title: Writing Is Hard
item.description: I setup a this blog, created a mini Hugo deployment script, and wrote my hello world post more than two weeks ago now. This was with the best intentions to post about my thoughts, not for an audience but to gain clarity with ideas.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Hello and welcome. This is my latest attempt at having some sort of personal homepage on the internet, where I can write about any subjects that are currently living in my head.
